extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade BIG-IP Software
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade BIG-IP software to the corresponding patches for CVE-2020-5902.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is there evidence of CVE-2020-5902 exploitation after patching?

extracted_playbook.title: Reconstitute Affected Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Take immediate action to reconstitute affected systems if exploitation evidence is found after patching.

extracted_playbook.title: Reimage Compromised Hosts
extracted_playbook.description: Reimage compromised hosts to restore them to a secure state.

extracted_playbook.title: Provision New Account Credentials
extracted_playbook.description: Create new account credentials to replace potentially compromised ones.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Access to Management Interface
extracted_playbook.description: Limit access to the management interface to the fullest extent possible to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Segmentation
extracted_playbook.description: Implement network segmentation to prevent intruder propagation and lateral movement within the network.
